description: This protocol describes MesoScale Discovery (MSD) assays  for measurement of proinflammatory cytokines in supernatants collected from T cell dependent cytotoxicity (TDCC) cultures after BiTE® treatment.
protocol_affiliation: Department of Oncology Research, Amgen Inc.
manuscript_citation: Ross SL, Sherman M, McElroy PL, Lofgren JA, Moody G, Baeuerle PA, Coxon A, Arvedson T, Bispecific T cell engager (BiTE) antibody constructs can mediate bystander tumor cell killing. PLoS ONE 12(8). doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0183390

collections.protocol_name: Collection of protocols accompanying "Bispecific T cell engager (BiTE®) antibody constructs can mediate bystander tumor cell killing"
collections.protocol_name_html: Collection of protocols accompanying "Bispecific T cell engager (BiTE®) antibody constructs can mediate bystander tumor cell killing"

components.data:
• Human Proinflammatory-4 I Tissue Culture Kit, MSD, P/N K15009B-2, Lot # K0034148
  • Human Proinflammatory-4 I Plate, MSD, P/N N45009B-1, Lot # Z0044786
  • Diluent 1, MSD, P/N R50CK-4, Lot #Y0220021
  • Diluent 100, MSD, P/N R50AA-4, Lot #Y0270189
  • MSD Blocker B, P/N R93BB-2, Lot # Y0210033
  • Human Proinflammatory-4 I Antibody Blend, MSD, P/N D2009-3, Lot # D0032825
  • Human Proinflammatory-4 I Calibrator Blend, MSD, P/N C0009-2, Lot # A0031804
  • PBST (PBS + 0.05% Tween 20)
  • DPBS, Life, P/N 14190

source_data.description:
• Human Proinflammatory-4 I Tissue Culture Kit, MSD, P/N K15009B-2, Lot # K0034148
  • Human Proinflammatory-4 I Plate, MSD, P/N N45009B-1, Lot # Z0044786
  • Diluent 1, MSD, P/N R50CK-4, Lot #Y0220021
  • Diluent 100, MSD, P/N R50AA-4, Lot #Y0270189
  • MSD Blocker B, P/N R93BB-2, Lot # Y0210033
  • Human Proinflammatory-4 I Antibody Blend, MSD, P/N D2009-3, Lot # D0032825

components.data: Reagents
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Wash Buffer (PBS + 0.05% Tween 20):  2L (2000mL) PBS + 1.0 mL Tween20
  2. Prepare Blocker B Solution (1% w/v Blocker B in PBS):  20 mL PBS + 200 mg Blocker B
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Wash Buffer (PBS + 0.05% Tween 20):  2L (2000mL) PBS + 1.0 mL Tween20
  2. Prepare Blocker B Solution (1% w/v Blocker B in PBS):  20 mL PBS + 200 mg Blocker B

components.data: Prepare solutions
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Add 150 uL of Blocker B Solution (Step 2) to each well of the pre-coated plate
  2. Seal the plate
  3. Incubate for 1 hour at room temperature, with shaking at 800 rpm
components.name: Description

source_data.description:

components.data: Prepare standard (calibration curve)
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Wash the plate 3X with PBST using a plate washer

2. Blot plate on a paper towel
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Wash the plate 3X with PBST using a plate washer

2. Blot plate on a paper towel

components.data: Wash blocked plate
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Add 25 µL of neat sample and standards to the appropriate wells of the plate
  2. Seal the plate
  3. Incubate for 2 hours at room temperature, with shaking at 800 rpm
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Add 25 µL of neat sample and standards to the appropriate wells of the plate
  2. Seal the plate
  3. Incubate for 2 hours at room temperature, with shaking at 800 rpm

components.data: Add sample and standards to plate
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Add sample and standards to plate

components.data:
1. 2.94 mL Diluent 100 + 60 µL 50X Detection Antibody
  2.  Keep in the dark
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. 2.94 mL Diluent 100 + 60 µL 50X Detection Antibody
  2.  Keep in the dark

components.data: Prepare Detection Antibody solution (1X in PBS)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Prepare Detection Antibody solution (1X in PBS)

components.data:
1. 25 µL of Detection Antibody Solution to each well
  2. Seal the plate
  3. Cover with aluminum foil
  4. Incubate for 2 hours at room temperature, with shaking at 800 rpm
components.name: Description

components.data: 11 mL DI H20 + 11 mL 4X Read Buffer

components.data: Prepare 2X Read Buffer Solution
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. After incubation, wash the plate 3X with PBST using a plate washer
  2. Blot plate on a paper towel
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. After incubation, wash the plate 3X with PBST using a plate washer
  2. Blot plate on a paper towel

components.data: Wash plates
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Add 150 µL 2X Read Buffer solution to each well of the MSD plate
  2. Make sure there are NO BUBBLES
  3. Read immediately on MSD instrument
